member.summary: Allow the entries that match the specified pattern.

member.name: F:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterEffect.Exclude
member.summary: Exclude the entries that match the specified pattern.

member.name: T:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterEntry
member.summary: Represents a single filter entry. The filter is used to allow or exclude particular database objects during generation.

member.name: M:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterEntry.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified catalog, schema, and name filters.
member.param: The pattern to use to select the appropriate catalog.
The pattern to use to select the appropriate schema or null to not limit by schema.
The pattern to use to select the appropriate name or null to not limit by name.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class the specified catalog, schema, name, and type filters, and filter effect setting.
member.param: The pattern to use to select the appropriate catalog or null to not limit by catalog.
The pattern to use to select the appropriate schema or null to not limit by schema.
The pattern to use to select the appropriate name or null to not limit by name.
The type of objects to apply this filter to.
An value indicating whether to allow or exclude entries that match the specified filters.

member.name: P:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterEntry.Catalog
member.summary: Gets the pattern that will be used to select the appropriate catalog.
member.returns: The Catalog part of the database name where the database name is formatted as Catalog.Schema.Name.

member.name: P:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterEntry.Effect
member.summary: Gets the effect that this filter has on results.
member.returns: An value that indicates whether to allow or exclude entries that match the specified filters.

member.name: P:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterEntry.Name
member.summary: Gets the pattern that will be used to select the appropriate name.
member.returns: The Name part of the database name where the database name is formatted as Catalog.Schema.Name.

member.name: P:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterEntry.Schema
member.summary: Gets the pattern that will be used to select the appropriate schema.
member.returns: The Schema part of the database name where the database name is formatted as Catalog.Schema.Name.

member.name: P:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterEntry.Types
member.summary: Gets the types of objects that this filter applies to.
member.returns: An value indicating the types of objects to apply to the filter to.

member.summary: Specifies the store object type to apply the schema filter to.

member.summary: Initial value. This is not a valid value to apply.

member.name: F:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterObjectTypes.Table
member.summary: Apply the filter to table object types.

member.name: F:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterObjectTypes.View
member.summary: Apply the filter to view object types.

member.name: F:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterObjectTypes.Function
member.summary: Apply this filter to function object types.

member.name: F:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterObjectTypes.All
member.summary: Apply the filter to all object types.
